column4: hello i got a dvd whit 14 iso ditro inside i installed qemu how do i run em now to try em?
any one know how to use qemu from shell?
who can help me whit qemu?
i have a dvd from a zine whit 14 recent distros i installed qemu how do i run em now to try them they are iso
asking a more specific question - does wonders...

i woudl think a read of the qemu docs would be in order.. you have to run qemu with the proper options to tell it to use the .iso files as the cd drive.. I reccomend you just go get vmware-server and use it instead.. or that other Virtuilixation tool.. (but i forget the name)
huh.. why cant you just  download the virtualbox deb and sudo dpkg -i virtualbox.deb (or whatever its called)
time to read some begainner guides i guess. :)
"sudo dpkg -i PACKAGENAME.deb"   for installing things you download.
assuming ya got all the other dependencies installed if any are needed.
exe? you dident want a exe ya wanted the .deb :)

one thing about virtual box.. you will need to edit the /etc/group file, (as root) and the last line     vboxusers:x:1003:willis  , (willis is my username) you will need to add your own user names there (instead of willis) to let users run VIrtualbox.. (or use sudo Virtualbox)
you realize that command you used said basicially 'look in the current directory for the Virtualbox.deb file?"
if its not in the current dir.. give the full path, or cd to where the file is at THEN use the command.. bash 101.
if you cant handle the idea if 'current directory and paths' well i suggest reading a few bash beginner guides.
hint... do a 'cd Desktop' THEN run that  sudo dpkg -i Whatevercommand
